wms_article.title: C&C International to build $94 mn cosmetics plant in Cheongju

wms_article_body.body: Cosmetics original design manufacturer (ODM) C&C International Co. will build a new plant in Cheongju, North Chungcheong Province. The company said Wednesday it signed a 130 billion won ($94.2 million) investment agreement with the North Chungcheong provincial government and Cheongju city for the project. The facility, which will be built on a 64,000 square-meter site in Cheongju Central Valley and will produce both color cosmetics as well as skincare products. Construction is set to begin in November 2025, with completion targeted for March 2027. When finished, the plant will boost C&C Internationalâ€™s annual production capacity from 450 million units to 1.45 billion units. The company plans to leverage the new facility to accelerate expansion of its skincare lineup. Local governments will provide administrative support for the project, while C&C International has pledged to aid the regional economy by sourcing materials locally and pursuing other cooperative measures.
